page.title: 01THE ALTRINCHAM AREA
page.content: ALTRINCHAM IS A BUSY MARKET TOWN, WITH ITS OWN CHARACTER, EVEN THOUGH IT IS OFTEN IDENTIFIED AS A SUBURB OF MANCHESTER. THE HOUSING INTHE LOCALE IS MIXED, RANGING FROM VERY SMALL OLD COTAGES, TO INDUSTRIAL TYPE TERRACES, TO THE HOMES OF SUBURBIA, TO LARGE MANSIONS. AS WITH THE HOUSING, THE INDUSTRY IS ALSO VERY MIXED; HEAVY AND LIGHT INDUSTRY,LEISURE FACILITIES,SHOPS AND OFFICES, AS WELL AS SOME HORTICULTURE AND AGRICULTURE. ALTRINCHAM HAS A LOT OF RECORDED HISTORY,DATING BACK TO BEFORE THE ROMANS.
